member.name: T:Calc.Func
member.summary: Contains 7 functions of different maths actions.
member.value: Each function of the class gets 1 or 2 doubles and always returns 1 double

member.name: M:Calc.Func.Sqrt(System.Double)
member.summary: Counts the square root a number.

member.name: M:Calc.Func.Pow(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Counts the pervii double v stepeni vtorogo.

member.name: M:Calc.Func.Fac(System.Double)
member.summary: Counts the factorial of a number.

member.name: T:Calc.Menu
member.summary: Contains 2 functions, provides kind of an interface for user.
member.value: Each function of the class gets a string. ParserM returns string. StartMenu is void function

member.name: M:Calc.Menu.ParserM(System.String)
member.summary: Recognize and do what action user expects if its possible, if not reports about it.
member.value: ParserM gets a string from user, through StartMenu, and doubles from Func. ParserM returns string.

member.name: M:Calc.Menu.StartMenu
member.summary: Recognize and do what action user expects if its possible, if not reports about it, provides templates.
member.value: StartMenu gets strings from user, and strings from ParserM. Returns nothing, but prints in console the results.
